commit message: Bump version to 10.3.992
Fix some typos.
Remove FlashcardExchange private card support.

Initially add support for multi-sided card display.

Still work in progress and crashes a lot.

Add flippable card that can display question / answer/ note field.
Add two-fields card that can display as current single sided card but
both fields are flippable to other fields.
Fix layout to use the new fragment design.
Make images working for the new fragment framework.
Fix broken CardPlayerActivity.
Card field customization is working for the new card framework.
Fix some test compile issues.
Refactory the show answer view strings.
Fix CardTextUtilTest and StudyActivityFilterCategoryTest.
Update some comments.
Add the sliding animations. Slightly modifed the animation with a zoom effect.
Use common animation logic for all views. Animation for double sided cards.
Fix lint errors.
Fix more lint warnings.
Fix study activity's landscape layout. Remove useless layout.
Better handling version number. Grade button help is back.
Remove useless strings.
Update the eclipse deps for appcompat
Sort categories alphabetically. Resolve issue 284.
Fix problem when importing mnemosyne cards that have multiple tags.
Fix title overlapping in the 'paint'.

Fix a type conversion error causing crash the activity is restarted
after OOM.
Rename a misnamed test.
Add Finnish translations.
Update Finnish translations.
Use 'Yes', 'No', 'Cancel' button for the card editor

Remove version string in strings.xml in favor of the one in
AndroidManifest.xml

Indent fixes,
removed app_version,
translation refinements
indent fixes
indent fixes
Separater the secrets into AMSecrets.java which is not checked in.
Update documents for AMSecrets.java.template
Generate better version string using gradle.
Use flavors (WIP)
Update build script to take card of flavor
Change build version name so the b****** will on be on debug build.
Tomestone the obsolete dir.
Move scripts to scripts directory. Refactory eclipse support.
Update README
sign-apk.sh accept flavor as an argument.
Move all eclipse deps to one place
Remove files that is not needed for gradle build.
Update README
Delete useless files used in old build system.
Do not use more memory in iajc.
Add convert and merge function and related tests.

Do not restart the activity when deleting a db through long click in
file browser.
Validate saved path in file browser.
Use more descriptive text for button styles.

Fix null pointer issue for new installation caused by the existence
check for default root.
Bump version number
Back up the existing db when converting a db with the same name.
Add git rank script
Update Italian translation

Add findFileInCardText in AMStringUtils to find file references in a
card.
Add findFileInPaths in AMFileUtil to find a file in search paths.
Refactory CardImageGetter to use amFileUtil.findFileInPaths

Display image in an image viewer when long clicking a card with an image.

Also added an option to enable/disable it in the options.
Revert the options. The Long click to view image is not configurable.

Modify download source FlashcardExchange to Cram.

Also modified several download source and remove experimental tag.
Fix the CardEditor losing card changes after category chagne. Fix issue 80.
Update flashcardexchange url to cram.com
Use Cram API v2 for user card list search.
Use new Cram API for search.
Support pagination to load all card in Cram's search.
Rename FELauncher to CramLauncher.
Rus translation update
Typos
Update search by title text.
Update Italian translation
Rus translation update
Add workaround for addFooter crash causing by Android 2.3 bug.
Update to gradle plugin 0.9
Update to Robotium 5.1. (Some tests may fail, need to fix later).
Update build.gradle for dir change. Upgrade to Robotium to 5.1 and fix tests.
More aggressive null out fields for GC on tests.
Fix a null pointer issue when updating widget.
Remove commons-lang3 dependency in favor of guava.
Fix the join issue of oauth token.
Fix a truncating problem in statistics. Fix bug in GradeButtonsFragment
Update Chinese translations
Bump version to 10.4
